/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in a palette of red, white, and blue, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the colorful buildings. In the distance, the iconic skyline of Beijing punctuates the horizon. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
